name: Vacuum 'N' Shoot
description:
Suck up Ammo with Blue Player and Shoot it at your enemies with Red Player! 

Plug in a controller of your choice (Switch, Xbox, PS4) and enjoy! :)

Controls:
Blue Player 
-Left Stick - Move
-Left bumper - Jump
-Left Trigger - Vacuum

Red Player
-Right Stick - Move
-Right Bumper - Jump
-Right Trigger - Shoot
